briefTitle: Prevention of Lymphorrhea by Lanreotide in Axillary Dissection for Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Evaluation of the Efficacity of Lanreotide LP 90 mg to Minimized the Lymphorrhea Post Axillary Lymphadenectomy in Breast Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Quantity of lymph collected by the drain
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Adult patient (\> 18 years),
* Patient undergoing an axillary lymphadenectomy for breast cancer
* Patient giving her agreement after being informed

Exclusion Criteria:

* Patients that don't understand the trial
* Type 2 diabetic patients
* Cyclosporine treatment
* Biliary lithiasis
* Pregnancy or breast feeding
* Allergic reaction to Lanréotide or same class treatments
* Patient included in another trial within the last 30 days
